name: The Power of the Internet: A Boogie2988 Fan Game
name_original: The Power of the Internet: A Boogie2988 Fan Game
description:
The Power of the Internets... are GONE!!!
In this open world RPG,
take on the role of Boogie2988 and his best friend and dog pal, Sammy,
as you attempt to restore the Sub Club members and find the mysterious
Dez!
Someone has taken over Fayetteville and disbanded the Sub Club.
Collect Loot Crates that hold items like the infamous Mountain Dew!
Traverse many lands including Crystal Lake, Fran-Con, or invade a Bee Factory!
Perils include many enemies, including: Mimics, that can appear as anything to Goblins, which need ingratiating!
Battles
are turn based with a variety of monsters and status effects (such as
Sepsis, Diabetes, or Hunger) and can be challenged in a variety of ways
using the Magic / Song systems.
Gather Boogie's missing Magic Cards
and trade them in for the same spells your enemies use, with unique
animations! Keep an eye out for Boogie's Songs or Sammy's Throw
Abilities!
Relax from the main story by discovering hidden areas, mini-games, and maybe taking a turn at karaoke!
Avoid tedious leveling up by improving stats instantly after battle with the BITS System!
Find
Sammy, Diesel, NinjaChris, and Tank, then defeat your impostor and
rescue Dez all in this insane adventure inspired by Boogie2988 and his
Twitch streams!
